Filter workflows by criteria

Source: R/workflow_tidy_api.R
filter_workflows.Rd

Filter workflows in the active backend by survey type, edition, recipe ID, or certification level.

Usage

filter_workflows(
  survey_type = NULL,
  edition = NULL,
  recipe_id = NULL,
  certification_level = NULL
)

Arguments

survey_type

Character survey type or NULL.

edition

Character edition or NULL.

recipe_id

Character recipe ID or NULL (find workflows using this recipe).

certification_level

Character certification level or NULL.

Value

List of matching RecipeWorkflow objects.

See also

search_workflows, find_workflows_for_recipe

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
ech_wf <- filter_workflows(survey_type = "ech")
for_recipe <- filter_workflows(recipe_id = "recipe_001")
} # }
